Our Services

At NeuroConnect, we provide tailored support for autistic expats and their families. Navigating a new healthcare system can be overwhelming, but with our expert guidance and compassionate community, you're not alone. Here's how we can support you:

Free Guidance

Our dedicated volunteers will guide you through every step, from understanding insurance options and obtaining a diagnosis to finding the right specialists.

  • Personalized Consultation: Book one-on-one sessions with our volunteers who can walk you through the basics of healthcare in the Netherlands.
  • Healthcare Navigation Workshops: Join our free workshops designed to help newcomers understand local healthcare procedures, terminology, and resources.
  • Insurance Assistance: Get help finding the right insurance plans based on the required support for specialists.

Support groups

Led by certified coaches, we offer three types of support groups, each designed to address specific needs within the autistic expat community.

  • Family Support Groups: A supportive environment for families to connect, share advice, and navigate life with an autistic loved one.
  • Teenage Support Groups: A safe space for autistic teens to discuss school, friendships, and social challenges.
  • Support for Autistic Adults: A group designed for autistic adults to connect, share experiences, and discuss work, relationships, and daily life strategies.
